review: I spent a couple of months checking out a variety of ways to just get Netflix hooked up to my TV to have something different to watch once in awhile .... local Walmart tried and tried to sell me on their versions of Home Digital Entertainment, all of which cost more than Amazon's Fire Stick! .... once Amazon had it back in stock (because it is such a great seller), I paid for it, received it shortly thereafter, easy installment, added Amazon Prime, switched the Netflix from my computer over to my TV and added WWE network and found my little piece of Heaven on Earth!!
